mapper.select: SELECT A.POST_CODE , A.SELLER_CODE , A.BUYER_CODE , A.POST_CAT_CODE , A.AUTH_CODE , A.POST_TITLE , A.POST_CONTENT , A.LIKE_COUNT , A.POST_TIME , A.SOLD_YN , A.REPORT_COUNT , A.BLIND_YN , A.ITEM_PRICE , A.POST_VIEW FROM POST A ORDER BY A.POST_CODE DESC

SELECT A.POST_CODE , A.SELLER_CODE , A.BUYER_CODE , A.POST_CAT_CODE , A.AUTH_CODE , A.POST_TITLE , A.POST_CONTENT , A.LIKE_COUNT , A.POST_TIME , A.SOLD_YN , A.REPORT_COUNT , A.BLIND_YN , A.ITEM_PRICE , A.POST_VIEW FROM POST A
JOIN "USER" B ON (A.SELLER_CODE = B.USER_CODE) WHERE B.USER_ID LIKE '%' || #{value} || '%'
WHERE A.POST_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{value} || '%'
WHERE A.POST_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{value} || '%'
ORDER BY A.POST_CODE DESC

SELECT A.POST_CODE , C.USER_ID AS "SELLER_ID" , (SELECT G.USER_ID FROM POST F JOIN "USER" G ON (F.BUYER_CODE = G.USER_CODE) ) AS "BUYER_ID" , D.POST_CAT_NAME , B.AUTH_STATUS , A.POST_TITLE , A.POST_CONTENT , A.LIKE_COUNT , A.POST_TIME , A.SOLD_YN , A.REPORT_COUNT , A.BLIND_YN , A.ITEM_PRICE , A.POST_VIEW , E.IMG_CODE , E.IMG_CAT_CODE , E.INQ_CODE , E.POST_CODE , E.REVIEW_CODE , E.ORIG_NAME , E.UUID_NAME , E.IMG_TYPE , E.ORIG_PATH , E.THUMB_PATH FROM POST A JOIN AUTHENTIC B ON (A.AUTH_CODE = B.AUTH_CODE) JOIN "USER" C ON (A.SELLER_CODE = C.USER_CODE) JOIN POST_CAT D ON (A.POST_CAT_CODE = D.POST_CAT_CODE) JOIN IMG_FILE E ON (E.POST_CODE = A.POST_CODE) WHERE A.POST_CODE = #{code}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO POST A ( A.POST_CODE , A.SELLER_CODE , A.POST_CAT_CODE , A.AUTH_CODE , A.POST_TITLE , A.POST_CONTENT , A.ITEM_PRICE ) VALUES ( SEQ_POST_CODE.NEXTVAL, #{sellerCode}, #{catCode}, #{authCode}, #{title}, #{content}, #{itemPrice} )

SELECT MAX(A.POST_CODE) FROM POST A
INSERT INTO IMG_FILE A ( IMG_CODE , IMG_CAT_CODE , POST_CODE , ORIG_NAME , UUID_NAME , IMG_TYPE , ORIG_PATH , THUMB_PATH ) VALUES ( SEQ_IMG_CODE.NEXTVAL, 2, #{postCode}, #{origName}, #{uuidName}, #{imgType}, #{origPath}, #{thumbPath} )
mapper.update: UPDATE POST A SET A.BLIND_YN = 'Y' WHERE A.POST_CODE = #{code}
UPDATE POST A SET A.POST_VIEW = (SELECT B.POST_VIEW FROM POST B WHERE B.POST_CODE = #{code}) + 1 WHERE A.POST_CODE = #{code}
